statements.sql:
insert into "products" ("body_html", "created_at", "handle", "id", "image", "images", "options", "product_type", "published_at", "published_scope", "tags", "template_suffix", "title", "metafields_global_title_tag", "metafields_global_description_tag", "updated_at", "variants", "vendor") values ('
  • 7 RCA DRC62705E24G Dual Widescreen LCD Portable DVD Players
  • General Features:
  • Two (2) 7-inch DVD players
  • Play 2 different movies or 1 on both screens
  • Electronic Skip Protection (ESP) for smooth playback
  • Dolby Digital
  • Plays DVD Video and CD Digital Audio
  • Built-in speakers
  • Includes 2 Remote Controls - each DVD player has its own remote
  • Bonus Game Controller with built-in Games
  • Headrest mounting straps included
  • Region 1
  • Games:
  • Fire Base
  • Aether Cruiser
  • Fruit Pig
  • Skateboard
  • Diamond
  • Aim Cruise
  • Arena
  • Difference Picture
  • Burrow Explorer
  • Close Quarters
  • Crystal Ball
  • Crystal Blast
  • Cub Adventure
  • Ghost Castle
  • MouseHero
  • Russia
  • FallingBlocks
  • FinalBlood
  • Forest Adventure
  • Dinosaur
  • Hit Mouse
  • Controls/Ports:
  • Open
  • Previous
  • Next
  • Play/Pause
  • Stop/AV in (in unit A only)
  • Volume +/-
  • Headphone jack
  • Standby/On switch
  • To unit B/Game in jack or To unit A jack
  • DC in 8V-12V jack
  • Remote control sensor
  • Unit Dimensions:
  • 6.5 x 8.5 x 1.8-inches (H x W x D, approximate)
  • Two (2) 7 RCA DVD Players
  • Two (2) Remote Controls w/CR2025 batteries 
  • USB Game Controller w/3 AAA batteries
  • Two (2) Headrest Mounting straps
  • Connection cable
  • Car power adapter with splitter
  • Manual

Condition : This item is Class A refurbished. This is the cleanest class of refurbished product you can buy. This item will be free of defects. It has been repaired and tested by the manufacturer and the problem parts were replaced.
